tasks.task_description: Implement enhanced input validation with command sandboxing
Fix command injection vulnerabilities in executor
Add API key rotation and secure storage

description: Implement immediate security fixes for AI Terminal - addressing command injection, sudo handling, input validation, sandboxing, and API key security
context: Created secure environment configuration system with .env.example template and SecureConfig.js class that handles encrypted storage, API key rotation, and security policy management

Implemented enhanced InputValidator with comprehensive security validation including command injection detection, sandboxing, whitelist validation, restricted path checking, and security audit logging

Fixed command injection vulnerabilities in command_executor.js by implementing secure command parsing, removing shell:true usage, adding execution timeouts, creating secure environment variables, and removing insecure sudo/streaming methods

Implemented secure sudo handling with SecureSudoHandler.js using system authentication dialogs, updated AI service with secure API key management and rate limiting, and created comprehensive SecurityAuditLogger.js for security event logging and monitoring

Created comprehensive security test suite in __tests__/security/security.test.js covering InputValidator, SecureConfig, SecurityAuditLogger, and integration tests. Updated main.js to integrate security components including SecureConfig and SecurityAuditLogger. All immediate security concerns have been addressed with proper implementations and testing.
